{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Accounts Payable Officer",
  "description": "Me Cure Services - Diagnostic &amp; Healthcare Center Nigeria Me Cure Healthcare Limited (MHL) is a Leader in the Medical Diagnostic and Healthcare sector in Nigeria and the West African sub-region with an established Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company in Lagos, and Diagnostic Centers in Lagos,&nbsp;Victoria Islands and Kano.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Payable Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Accounts Payable Officer ensures that all vendor invoices are accurately processed and paid on time, maintaining healthy relationships with suppliers.


Duties &amp; Responsibilities


	Review and verify vendor invoices for accuracy and compliance.
	Process payments and ensure timely disbursements to suppliers.
	Maintain accurate records of all account payable transactions.
	Reconcile vendor statements and resolve any discrepancies.
	Assist in month-end closing activities related to payables/receivable.


Requirements / Qualifications
Education &amp; Training:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Banking &amp; Finance or any Finance related field


Knowledge &amp; Experience:


	1 - 2 years of relevant of proven experience
	Professional certification (e.g., CPA, ACCA) is a plus.
	Proficiency in accounting software (Tally) and Microsoft Office Suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to:&nbsp;hr@mecure.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the&nbsp;email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-09-22",

Accounts Payable Officer Job at Me Cure Services




        
    

        
        Me Cure Services - Diagnostic & Healthcare Center Nigeria Me Cure Healthcare Limited (MHL) is a Leader in the Medical Diagnostic and Healthcare sector in Nigeria and the West African sub-region with an established Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company in Lagos, and Diagnostic Centers in Lagos, Victoria Islands and Kano.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Payable Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	The Accounts Payable Officer ensures that all vendor invoices are accurately processed and paid on time, maintaining healthy relationships with suppliers.


Duties & Responsibilities


	Review and verify vendor invoices for accuracy and compliance.
	Process payments and ensure timely disbursements to suppliers.
	Maintain accurate records of all account payable transactions.
	Reconcile vendor statements and resolve any discrepancies.
	Assist in month-end closing activities related to payables/receivable.


Requirements / Qualifications
Education & Training:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Banking & Finance or any Finance related field


Knowledge & Experience:


	1 - 2 years of relevant of proven experience
	Professional certification (e.g., CPA, ACCA) is a plus.
	Proficiency in accounting software (Tally) and Microsoft Office Suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: hr@mecure.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Inventory Officer Job at Compovine Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Compovine Technologies Limited is an indigenous company with the main aim of offering Information Technology, Sales and Services to individuals and corporate organizations. Compovine Technology Limited currently has branches in Ibadan, Abuja, Lagos, Lokoja, Kano, Kaduna, Jos, Minna, Port Harcourt and Enugu, and we are still expanding.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc with 4 - 10 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@compovine.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
